verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came unto me <S%H559>again<s%>, saying,

What mean <S%H4911>you<s%>, that you use this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> concerning the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H398>eaten<s%> sour <S%H1155>grapes<s%>, and the <S%H1121>children<s%>'s <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are set on <S%H6949>edge<s%>?
As I <S%H2416>live<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, you shall not have occasion any more to <S%H4911>use<s%> this <S%H4912>proverb<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H5315>Behold<s%>, all souls are <S%H5315>mine<s%>; as the soul of the <S%H1>father<s%>, so also the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5315>mine<s%>: the soul that <S%H2398>sins<s%>, it shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.
But if a <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H6662>just<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>,

And has not <S%H398>eaten<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, neither has lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, neither has <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbors<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>, neither has come <S%H7126>near<s%> to a <S%H5079>menstruous<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>,

And has not <S%H3238>oppressed<s%> <S%H376>any<s%>, but has <S%H7725>restored<s%> to the <S%H2326>debtor<s%> his <S%H2258>pledge<s%>, has <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> none by <S%H1500>violence<s%>, has <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry<s%>, and has <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5903>naked<s%> with a <S%H899>garment<s%>;

He that has not given <S%H5414>forth<s%> upon <S%H5392>usury<s%>, neither has <S%H3947>taken<s%> any <S%H8636>increase<s%>, that has <S%H7725>withdrawn<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, has <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> between <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H376>man<s%>,

Has <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and has <S%H8104>kept<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, to <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H571>truly<s%>; he is <S%H6662>just<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>.

If he <S%H3205>beget<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%> that is a <S%H6530>robber<s%>, a <S%H8210>shedder<s%> of <S%H1818>blood<s%>, and that <S%H6213>does<s%> the <S%H251>like<s%> to any one of these <S%H259>things<s%>,
And that <S%H6213>does<s%> not any of those <S%H398>duties<s%>, but even has eaten upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, and <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbors<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>,

Has <S%H3238>oppressed<s%> the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>, has <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> by <S%H1500>violence<s%>, has not <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge<s%>, and has lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols<s%>, has <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%>,

Has given <S%H5414>forth<s%> upon <S%H5392>usury<s%>, and has <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H8636>increase<s%>: shall he then <S%H2425>live<s%>? he shall not <S%H2421>live<s%>: he has <S%H6213>done<s%> all these <S%H8441>abominations<s%>; he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>; his blood shall be upon <S%H1818>him<s%>.

<S%H3205>Now<s%>, behold, if he beget a <S%H1121>son<s%>, that <S%H7200>sees<s%> all his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H2403>sins<s%> which he has <S%H6213>done<s%>, and <S%H7200>considers<s%>, and <S%H6213>does<s%> not such <S%H2004>like<s%>,

That has not <S%H398>eaten<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>, neither has lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, has not <S%H2930>defiled<s%> his <S%H7453>neighbors<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%>,

Neither has <S%H3238>oppressed<s%> <S%H376>any<s%>, has not <S%H2254>withheld<s%> the <S%H2258>pledge<s%>, neither has <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> by <S%H1500>violence<s%>, but has <S%H5414>given<s%> his <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7457>hungry<s%>, and has <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H5903>naked<s%> with a <S%H899>garment<s%>,

That has taken <S%H7725>off<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> from the <S%H6041>poor<s%>, that has not <S%H3947>received<s%> <S%H5392>usury<s%> nor <S%H8636>increase<s%>, has <S%H6213>executed<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, has <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>; he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>.

As for his <S%H1>father<s%>, because he <S%H6233>cruelly<s%> <S%H6231>oppressed<s%>, <S%H1497>spoiled<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> by <S%H1499>violence<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> that which is not <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H4191>behold<s%>, even he shall die in his <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>.

Yet <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H1121>you<s%>, Why? does not the son <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%>? When the <S%H1121>son<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>, and has <S%H8104>kept<s%> all my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2421>them<s%>, he shall surely <S%H2421>live<s%>.

The <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H2398>sins<s%>, it shall <S%H4191>die<s%>. The <S%H1121>son<s%> shall not <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>father<s%>, neither shall the <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%>: the <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall be upon <S%H7564>him<s%>, and the wickedness of the wicked shall be upon <S%H7563>him<s%>.

But if the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> will <S%H7725>turn<s%> from all his <S%H2403>sins<s%> that he has <S%H6213>committed<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> all my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>.

All his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> that he has <S%H6213>committed<s%>, they shall not be <S%H2142>mentioned<s%> unto <S%H6666>him<s%>: in his righteousness that he has <S%H6213>done<s%> he shall <S%H2421>live<s%>.

Have I any <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> at <S%H2654>all<s%> that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> should <S%H4194>die<s%>? <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>: and not that he should <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and <S%H2421>live<s%>?

But when the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> turns <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H6213>does<s%> according to all the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man <S%H6213>does<s%>, shall he <S%H2425>live<s%>? All his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> that he has <S%H6213>done<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>mentioned<s%>: in his <S%H4603>trespass<s%> that he has <S%H4604>trespassed<s%>, and in his <S%H2403>sin<s%> that he has <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, in them shall he <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Yet you <S%H559>say<s%>, The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal<s%>. <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H1004>now<s%>, O house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; Is not my <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8505>equal<s%>? are not your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H8505>unequal<s%>?

When a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man turns <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, and <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%>, and <S%H4191>dies<s%> in <S%H5766>them<s%>; for his iniquity that he has <S%H6213>done<s%> shall he <S%H4191>die<s%>.

<S%H7563>Again<s%>, when the wicked man turns <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> that he has <S%H6213>committed<s%>, and <S%H6213>does<s%> that which is <S%H4941>lawful<s%> and <S%H6666>right<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>save<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%>.

Because he <S%H7200>considers<s%>, and turns <S%H7725>away<s%> from all his <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> that he has <S%H6213>committed<s%>, he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, he shall not <S%H4191>die<s%>.

Yet <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is not <S%H8505>equal<s%>. O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, are not my <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H8505>equal<s%>? are not your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H8505>unequal<s%>?

Therefore I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H1004>you<s%>, O house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>. <S%H7725>Repent<s%>, and <S%H7725>turn<s%> yourselves from all your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>; so <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> shall not be your <S%H4383>ruin<s%>.

Cast <S%H7993>away<s%> from you all your <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>, by which you have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%>; and <S%H6213>make<s%> you a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and a <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%>: for why will you <S%H4191>die<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>?

For I have no <S%H2654>pleasure<s%> in the <S%H4194>death<s%> of him that <S%H4191>dies<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>: therefore <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H2421>yourselves<s%>, and live you.
